description: In a dreamlike barn setting, Robert Black jacks his cock in the shadows while Sky Donovan appears to relax amidst bales of straw. As in a dream, Sky suddenly finds himself bound against the supports of a corrugated tin wall...ass bare and exposed...t-shirt in tatters. Robert Black flogs Sky's ass again and again...over and over until it glows red. Then Robert rips of Sky's T and starts shreddingSky's back...beating him again and again until Sky's back is rosy and swollen. Robert douses Sky with liquid, then leaves him to stand and endure the sting of his tender flesh before torturing Sky once again with fragments of straw...each one burning a painful trail in his raw flesh. Finally Sky's hands are freed and he drops exhausted into the straw.
title: Induction
